summary:
Sode no Shirayuki from the anime bleach.

Mod request by keionn.
descriptionHtml:
Sode no Shirayuki from the anime bleach modeled and textured by me. This is my first mod so any feedback would be much appreciated.

Mod request by keionn.

Craft this sword at a forge with 2 iron ingots and 1 leather strip. improve it with 1 iron ingot.

If anyone has any suggestions on what materials should be used to craft \\ improve the sword and what the damage, speed and critical should be to make it balanced.
author: Ross Allison
